concept.title: Monkeys are good people
concept.shortdesc: We appreciate your commitment to the monkey lifestyle

conbody.p: Hello monkey friend. Not that you are a friend who is a monkey, but you are a friend of monkeys. This manual includes everything you need to know in order to become the best monkey person ever. Please read and be happy.
conbody.note: Monkeys are fun, but they can be mean! Be careful when handling monkeys.
